text: @WhiteHouse actually, no. The huge & growing consensus of Americans is that Covid19 outbreak underscores importance of not electing a clown to the presidency. The most inept, bungling, chaotic, confusion-mongering fool person America could find, Donal Trump, just doesn't cut it. But nice try

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
